overview: Life and death are intertwined. We all were born. And we all will die. Yet, most of us don’t dwell on the latter. But what happens when we’re forced to confront our mortality? Here Right Now looks at life through the lenses of Julie and Layton, two young adults living with terminal cancer, as they face that very question and candidly share what it’s like to all at once be dying, and living.
title: Here Right Now
